projects.name: Platform for Story Writers
description: Built a community-driven platform for story writers to publish, explore, and review stories, with secure access through session-based authentication and hashed password storage.
Implemented features including user profiles with author pages, personal review dashboards, and story detail pages displaying average ratings and review counts.
Enforced business rules and constraints, such as requiring login for story and review actions, preventing self-ratings, limiting one rating per story per user.

projects.name: Employee and Attendance Management System
description: Developed a Java-based HR backend system to manage employees, track attendance, leaves, and holidays.

Implemented features including employee management with reporting hierarchy, check-in/check-out tracking, leave application and cancellation, and calendar views displaying attendance, leave, holidays, and weekends.

Enforced business rules and constraints, such as restricting check-ins/outs on leave or holidays, preventing multiple conflicting actions, validating leave eligibility, and logging all successful attendance actions.

projects.name: Local Network Chat Room with Multi-Client Support
description: Built a chat server to allow multiple clients to communicate in a shared local area chat room, using sockets, multithreading, and locks.
Implemented features including real-time message delivery and acknowledgements for join, leave, and disconnect events.
Enforced business rules and constraints, such as connection limits, seamless client disconnect handling, and thread-safe message broadcasting to prevent data loss.

projects.name: Taxi Booking and Fare Estimation Application
description: Contributed to the development of a taxi booking application for a startup, implementing vehicle selection and map-based location selection.
Built booking and ride history features with dynamic fare calculation based on distance and vehicle type.

projects.name: Real-Time Human Pose and Progress Tracking Platform
description: Built a real-time pose analysis platform using Googleâ€™s Mediapipe Pose library for accurate body movement tracking.
Designed and implemented graph-based comparison and historical data tracking to monitor user progress over time.

projects.name: Serverless Image Background Removal Tool
description: Built a serverless function to remove image backgrounds using external API, integrated with frontend upload/download UI.
Deployed using cloud serverless architecture, improving scalability and reducing server maintenance overhead.

projects.name: Interactive 2D Soft Body Simulation
description: Developed a real-time soft body simulation using a mass-spring system with node-based structure.
Implemented gravity, spring tension visualization through color changes, and interactive node dragging for dynamic deformation.

projects.name: 2D Fish Behavior and Food-Seeking Simulation
description: Developed a 2D fish simulation where multiple fish agents navigate an environment with randomly spawning food items.
Implemented fish movement behaviors including seeking food and adjusting velocity based on food location, with real-time visual updates using Pygame.

projects.name: Box Breaker 2D Arcade Game
description: Created a 2D arcade-style game where the player controls a ball (via up/left/right keys) to hit falling boxes; game restarts on miss.
Implemented continuous box spawning from the bottom, collision detection with the ball, and score reset on failure.
